description:
The woman who lent Yaya to Raishin. She`s the greatest puppeteer of the current age and the one who produced Yaya and the rest of the Setsugetsuka Series. She`s a sexy woman who wears her kimono open around her large breasts, and she`s famous for her indulgences in wine and women.
Source: ANN
name: Karyuusai Shouko
